Package game

Class Room

java.lang.Object
game.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Room extends Object implements Serializable
Each room in the game is represented by an object of this class. Room objects are linked together to form the game world.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String label, String name)
      Creates a new Room object with the given room label and room name. Room label must match a label in the rooms.txt or rooms.dat input file.
      Parameters:
      label - room label
      name - room name

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item)
      Adds the given item to this room.
      Parameters:
      item - item to add to this room

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item, String name)
      Adds the given item with the given name to this room. The name can be used by the player to refer to the item. Use this method to introduce an alias for an existing item.
      Parameters:
      item - item to add
      name - name of item

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(String name)
      Removes the item with the given name from this room.
      Parameters:
      name - name of item to remove

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem(String name)
      Returns true if an item with the given name exists in this room.
      Parameters:
      name - name of item
      Returns:
      true if item is in the room

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(String name)
      Returns the item with the given name if that item is present in the room. Returns null otherwise.
      Parameters:
      name - name of item
      Returns:
      item with the given name, or null

    • addNPC

      public void addNPC(NPC npc)
      Adds the given NPC to this room.
      Parameters:
      npc - NPC to add

    • addNPC

      public void addNPC(NPC npc, String name)
      Adds the given NPC with the given name to this room. The name can be used by the player to refer to the NPC. Use this method to introduce an alias for an existing NPC.
      Parameters:
      npc - NPC to add
      name - name of NPC

    • removeNPC

      public void removeNPC(String name)
      Removes the NPC with the given name from this room.
      Parameters:
      name - name of NPC

    • hasNPC

      public boolean hasNPC(String name)
      Returns true if an NPC with the given name exists in this room.
      Parameters:
      name - name of NPC
      Returns:
      true if NPC is present

    • getNPC

      public NPC getNPC(String name)
      Returns the NPC with the given name if that NPC is present in this room. Returns false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      name - name of NPC
      Returns:
      true if NPC is present

    • addExit

      public void addExit(Room room, int direction)
      Adds an exit from this room to the given room in the given direction. Use this method to link rooms together so that the player can navigate from one to the other.
      Parameters:
      room - room to connect to this room
      direction - direction player must travel to enter the given room

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of this room.
      Returns:
      room name

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of this room to the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - new name for this room

    • getDesc

      public String getDesc()
      Returns this room's description. This method is called automatically whenever the player enters the room from an adjacent room. This method will not be called automatically if the player is teleported to this room using Game.setCurrentRoom().
      Returns:
      room's description

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String label)
      Updates this room's description by updating the description label. The given label must match a label in the rooms.txt or rooms.dat input file.
      Parameters:
      label - new description label

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String label, String desc)
      Sets this room's description to the given description and updates the description label. The given label can be a new label and does not have to match a label in the rooms.txt or rooms.dat input file. Since labels must be unique, if the given label does match an existing description label, the existing description will be replaced with the given description.
      Parameters:
      label - new description label
      desc - new description

    • setLocked

      public void setLocked(boolean isLocked)
      Sets the locked state of this room: true if room is locked. A player cannot enter a locked room unless teleported there using Game.setCurrentRoom().
      Parameters:
      isLocked - should the room be locked?

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked()
      Returns true if this room is locked.
      Returns:
      true if locked

    • getRoomLabel

      public String getRoomLabel()
      Returns this room's room label.
      Returns:
      room label

    • hasSimpleItem

      public boolean hasSimpleItem(String name)
      Returns true if a simple item with the given name is present in this room.
      Parameters:
      name - name of simple item
      Returns:
      true if simple item is present

    • addSimpleItem

      public void addSimpleItem(String name, String label)
      Adds a simple item with the given name and label to this room. The label must uniquely identify the item. The name can be used by the player to refer to the item. Use this method to add an alias for an existing simple item.
      Parameters:
      name - name of simple item
      label - label identifying simple item

    • addSimpleItem

      public void addSimpleItem(String name, String label, String desc)
      Adds a simple item with the given name, label, and description to this room. The label must uniquely identify the item. The name can be used by the player to refer to the item.
      Parameters:
      name - name of simple item
      label - label identifying simple item
      desc - simple item's description

    • getSimpleItemDesc

      public String getSimpleItemDesc(String name)
      Returns the description of the simple item with the given name, if that simple item exists in this room. Returns null of the item is not present.
      Parameters:
      name - name of simple item
      Returns:
      simple item's description, or null

    • goEast

      public Room goEast()
      Returns the room the player enters when travelling East from this room.
      Returns:
      room to the east of this room
      Throws:
      game.InvalidDirectionException - if player cannot travel east

    • goWest

      public Room goWest()
      Returns the room the player enters when travelling West from this room.
      Returns:
      room to the wast of this room
      Throws:
      game.InvalidDirectionException - if player cannot travel west

    • goNorth

      public Room goNorth()
      Returns the room the player enters when travelling North from this room.
      Returns:
      room to the north of this room
      Throws:
      game.InvalidDirectionException - if player cannot travel north

    • goSouth

      public Room goSouth()
      Returns the room the player enters when travelling South from this room.
      Returns:
      room to the south of this room
      Throws:
      game.InvalidDirectionException - if player cannot south

    • goUp

      public Room goUp()
      Returns the room the player enters when travelling Up from this room.
      Returns:
      room above this room
      Throws:
      game.InvalidDirectionException - if player cannot travel up

    • goDown

      public Room goDown()
      Returns the room the player enters when travelling Down from this room.
      Returns:
      room below this room
      Throws:
      game.InvalidDirectionException - if player cannot travel down

    • equals

      public boolean equals(String label)
      Returns true if this room has the given room label.
      Parameters:
      label - room label
      Returns:
      true if this room has the given room label
